title: This ADC talk is just getting boring now
body:
It's all I see now on the boards, and frankly, it's getting really boring. 

I use to come to the boards for the memes, and then I stuck around and explored the other discussion threats, and began to read over more and more things, finding some unique and fun ideas and interesting conversations in Gameplay. 

But now all I primarily see is stuff like "ADC's are too strong, Riots never gonna change", or things like "Botlane is the only lane that matters" and so on and so forth with these kind of threads. 

I know the boards will really never change and will always try to complain about whatever seems strong right now, but sometimes, I just want a good 2-3 memes to be on the front page.

replies.body:
Look on the bright side: ADCs are getting nerfed, so all the bronzies are going to start crying about ADCs being useless.

Not to mention that none of it matters under plat or diamond.

> Look on the bright side: ADCs are getting nerfed, so all the bronzies are going to start crying about ADCs being useless.

No pro ADC threads have ever been upvoting to these boards in over a year.

"Look on the bright side: mages are getting nerfed, so all the bronzies are going to start crying about mages being useless."
Fun world we live in.

I mean seeing the amount of backlash towards mana changes, I have a feeling boards is going to lose their shit if assassins end up becoming stronger off of this.

Personally? I could care less about how much harder or easier the game becomes for me. It's just fun to speculate.

Boards loses their shit in response to pretty much everything how would that surprise you at all? The relative effectiveness of Assassins is probably not going to change much because they already stomp solo queue but they are still going to be irrelevant in pro because none of the things making them pointless is changing.

I can confirm that botlanes strength is pretty irrelevant in Bronze - Gold, they never rotate and thus they dont snowball the game out of control.

_Nothing_ matters in bronze to gold, except personal skill with your champion and how trash your team is.

Metagame is so poorly understood it often works against people, and tiny winrate differences dont matter when everyone is a monkey that cant CS or zone.

They are?

Going by riots record they no doubt will be even stronger.

Damage across the board needs to be nerfed not just from the adcs

I'm sorry, do plat and diamond get paid? No? Then it doesn't matter below pro level play.

In reality, it's a game with paying players supporting it at all ranks, and all ranks should be considered.

It does not matter because people are playing so sub-optimally at low ELO, tiny balance differences are the least of their problems. When player skill and teamwork is much closer to the ceiling, those little differences become important.
Times are a changing. Marksmen nerfs are on the forecast. We might have a fun game to play again
